text: Savka Nevenka Pollak Tomasevic (born 31 August 1973 in Santiago, Chile) is a Chilean journalist and television presenter of German, Polish and Croatian origin. == Television == Year Program Role Channel 1994 Siempre bien Presenter La Red 1995 Club de amigos de La Red Presenter La Red 1997-2002 Video loco Presenter Canal 13 1998 Jugando a saber Presenter Canal 13 1999-2000 El tiempo es oro Presenter Canal 13 2001-2002 La mañana del 13 Presenter Canal 13 2004 Sin prejuicios Panelist TVN 2005 Saping! Presenter Mega 2006 Vértigo Participant Canal 13 2009-2011 En portada Presenter UCV TV 2012 SQP Panelist Chilevisión 2013 Baila! Al ritmo de un sueño Participant (5th Eliminated) Chilevisión == Other websites == * Category:1973 births Category:Writers from Santiago Category:Living people Category:Chilean journalists Category:Chilean television presenters
title: Savka Pollak
